author: ajsutton
content: Confirmed that Teku is still accepting the Schlesi deposits and generating the right genesis.  If I use the Schlesi config with the Witti deposit contract Teku rejects the lighthouse deposits and accepts the Prysm ones which supports the theory that the Prysm deposits are using a genesis fork of 0, not the witti config.
